VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Crimson Quarter relative to Verdant Ward?
SRP.A: Crimson Quarter is {above} Verdant Ward in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total vaccination rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Crimson Quarter}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total vaccination rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Verdant Ward}.

VE.Q: What is Crimson Quarter's Vaccination Rate in 2015?
VE.A: Crimson Quarter's vaccination rate in 2015 is {100} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Vaccination Rate in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum vaccination rate is {18.96} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Vaccination Rate level recorded for Azure Enclave?

SC.Q: What is the average total Vaccination Rate?
SC.A: The average total vaccination rate is {334.75} %.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Vaccination Rate go below 308.39 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 2010 and 2014, was the average total Vaccination Rate higher or lower than between 2004 and 2009?
NC.A: The average total vaccination rate between 2010 and 2014 was {lower} than between 2004 and 2009.

NC.Q: Between 2005 and 2012, was the average total Vaccination Rate higher or lower than between 2004 and 2009?
NC.A: The average total vaccination rate between 2005 and 2012 was {lower} than between 2004 and 2009.

NC.Q: Between 2003 and 2014, did the total Vaccination Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 2003 and 2012?
NC.A: The change in total vaccination rate between 2003 and 2014 was {larger} than between 2003 and 2012.

NC.Q: Was the total Vaccination Rate in 2009 higher or lower than in 2010?
NC.A: The total vaccination rate in 2009 was {higher} than in 2010.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Crimson Quarter} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {District Alpha, Verdant Ward, Sector Beta, Crimson Quarter, Azure Enclave}.
